msg: HBASE-5100  Rollback of split could cause closed region to be opened again (Chunhui)

author: jmsnell
msg: Noticed that everywhere the ParserOptions was actually being used, we were making defensive copies of it anyway to ward off the evil spirits of mutability... this goes ahead and makes ParserOptions immutable and threadsafe just like all the other similar things throughout Abdera2.
